scripts.start: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true TS_NODE_TYPE_CHECK=false ts-node --project tsconfig.cli.json -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/main.ts
scripts.start-simple-for-test: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true TS_NODE_TYPE_CHECK=false ts-node --project tsconfig.cli.json -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/mainSimpleForTest.ts $CONVERSATION_ID
scripts.generate-readme: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true TS_NODE_TYPE_CHECK=false ts-node --project tsconfig.cli.json -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/readme-generator/main.ts
